{"id":396361889,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1600222719,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"328 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/396361889/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"26.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        \n        \n        // int L = 0; \n        // int R = s.length() - 1; \n        function<bool(int,int,bool)> ispal = [&](int L, int R, bool skipped) -> bool {\n            if (L > R) {\n                return false; \n            }\n            \n            if (L == R) {\n                return true; \n            }\n            \n            if (s[L] != s[R]) {\n                if (skipped) {\n                    return false; \n                }\n                \n                return ispal(L + 1, R, true) || ispal(L, R - 1, true); \n            } else {\n                \n                return (L == R - 1) || ispal(L + 1, R - 1, skipped); \n            }\n        };\n        \n        return ispal(0, s.length() - 1, false); \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
